title: COVID cases are slowing in the U.S. How much of this is attributed to mask-wearing and social distancing protocol vs. a lack of testing? - Quora

response.answer_text: We will see. While there has been better positive case numbers, there doesn't seem to.a one to one correlation between testing and death toll even accounting for the expected delays between the two.
